column1: Uncategorized;Preah Sihanouk Province: Police arrested a pair of bag-snatchers on April 12
column4: on the Old Theater Road in Village 1
column8: not yet identified were on a gold painted Honda when they robbed a Chinese male.------Police were alerted and chased the suspects
column9: and managed to catch them.------ The two suspects
column11: were caught with an IPHONE6 and $ 120  stolen from the victim.------They are being prepared for court.------Huy Bunleng
